name: chrome-vault-client
description: Chrome extension to store passwords in a Hashicorp Vault

scripts.build: rm -fr build; mkdir -p build && webpack --node-env production
scripts.postbuild: cp -r src/views/* src/images/ build && rm build/styles.js
scripts.package:chrome: cp src/manifest.chrome.json build/manifest.json && google-chrome --pack-extension=build && mv build.crx vault-client.crx && mv build.pem vault-client.pem
scripts.package:firefox: cp src/manifest.firefox.json build/manifest.json && cd build && zip -r -FS ../vault-client.zip *
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.presign: npm run build && cp src/manifest.firefox.json build/manifest.json
scripts.sign: node -r dotenv/config node_modules/.bin/web-ext sign -s build -i chrome*.js
